Suddenly, he was regretting not paying more attention in class as Spanish was never his strongest language. Maybe he'd spend more time that night learning while wearing the suit...

As Ms. Burrieza walked past him, her huge bottom bouncing up and down, Henry's stares caught the attention of one of his classmates.

"You certainly seem into the lesson, Henry." whispered Betty Bleu, a look of annoyance on her face.

Henry blushed and quickly mumbled the words. "S-Sorry, was just distracted is all."

Betty just huffed. "I'll bet you were..."

Betty went on angrily ignoring Henry the rest of the class despite his attempts to shoot her an apologetic look. It probably looked like he was eyeing his teacher, but there was no way Betty would ever guess why he had been doing it and what he was planning to do.

~

School felt like it had went on for an eternity by the time Henry was safely in his room. He had made up an excuse with his parents that he hadn't been feeling well and didn't want to eat any supper, they easily believed it because a flu had been going around the school over the past week. For good measure though, he locked the door.

"Finally..." he said, making his way towards the closet.

After digging around in the darkest pits of his clothing burial ground, he eventually found the bag with, to his relief, the deflated Burrieza skin inside. He had feared that someone might have discovered it despite his best efforts to conceal it. All of a sudden he was extremely nervous. He had talked himself into doing this over the school day, but he didn't expect to actually get to this point.

"Come on...Just do it...What's the worst that can happen?" he encouraged himself.

Stripping down, he laid the suit over his bed as he struggled to kick his clothes off. Once that was done, he grabbed the small skin of his Spanish teacher and held it out in front of him. There was only one way to get in. He had to stretch the mouth open to fit himself inside. This was easier than he initially thought it would be as the skin seemed to almost expand like it was made of a loose spandex material.

When the mouth was wide enough, he took two steps inside. Instantly his legs were greeted with a soothing warmth, like they had been wrapped with a thick wool blanket. The pleasant feeling only seem to spread as Henry worked the mouth of the suit up his naked body. Any fear he had of working this suit dissolved under the pure pleasure that the skin seemed to radiate.

Once the suit was at about chest level, he had to fit his arms inside just as he had his toes and feet. All that was left was the mask part of the suit which easily gulped his head as the hair dangled down. Henry aligned the eye sockets as a cooling rush coursed through his own skin. It was like he and the suit had merged, he could feel the cold of the room and the air blowing the the tiniest hairs on the skin.

He looked in his mirror and practically jumped back as a taller and thinner Ms. Burrieza stared back at him. He really could not tell that just moments ago this suit had merely been a flimsy costume hiding within his closet.

"This is too weird..." he said, moving his hands over his body. "...But nice..."

He felt sort of snug and compressed, like the suit was tightening every second. But it was in a nice sort of way. It was cozy and warm and Henry didn't want to do anything else but sleep all of a sudden.

"Maybe just a little nap then..." he mumbled. Waking up early that morning had finally gotten to him and he grabbed a handful of pajamas before clambering into bed.

When he was mostly dressed and comfortable under his thick bed sheets, which he felt with even more sensitivity for some reason, he drifted off into a peaceful dream about grading Spanish tests.

The next morning...
11311121.title: Onto business.

choices: Ms. Burrieza wants to speak with him after class.
113111211.content:
Never before had Henry woken up from such a comfortable sleep. The first rays of the morning sun leaked in through the shades covering his windows as he yawned and opened his eyes to be greeted by a new day. He hadn't expected to have fallen asleep so quickly and so soundly.

"Man...I feel good..." he mumbled, stretching only to look down and realize he was still in the suit.

That's when everything he had been doing the night before came rushing back to him. He looked down on his new form, his normal pajamas still comfortably fit him, so there was no apparent bodily change. But there was no way of telling that without taking off the suit.

Henry casually glanced at the clock. "6:47 AM" It was almost time to start getting ready for school and his parents would no doubt be coming in to check on him after he had claimed to be feeling sick earlier. He'd have to grudgingly leave the nice warmth of the suit behind and meet the freezing din of the cold fall morning. But part of him was still interested as to what changes had occurred to his real body overnight if the information packet hadn't been lying.

So he picked at the lip around his lips until a thin layer of flesh peeled itself off of his face. Eventually that layer grew into a mask of skin and in just a few minutes he had escaped the suit, it was just a pile of Ms Burrieza's skin once more.

The first thing he noticed about his form upon leaving the suit was that he felt an immense sense of relief all over his body. It was like he had been trapped in a tight place for a long time and this was the first chance his body had to breath in awhile. But the clearest thing different was his skin color, which made it look like he had spent the entire night in a tanning bed. His skin wasn't dried out out though, it was soft and smooth like it had been well taken care of with moisturizer. There was no doubt about it, it was the same shade of coffee color that matched the skin color of Ms. Burrieza.

"Yes, this is exactly what I wanted..." he mumbled to himself, which was true.

He had been hoping that the suit would change him but not in a way that would be plainly obvious like a rapid lose of height. With just a minor change in skin color like this, he could say that he merely had been getting some sun lately and no one would question him. Henry casually rubbed his arm, not used to the hairless softness of them. Who knew what the next changes might be. Henry almost couldn't wait for tonight.

"Henry! Wake up! It's time to get ready for school! Are you feeling any better?" asked his mom.

"Yeah mom, I feel great. Be right down."

At school...
113111211.title: Morning changes.

choices: His mother has a job for him to do all next week.
1131112111.content:
Like yesterday, school couldn't seem to go by fast enough for Henry. All too often he found himself looking out the window, completely uninterested. Though at least today he had the pleasant distraction of his new skin which for some reason he never got tired of stroking.

No one seemed to find his darker tone out of place and few even raised an eye at him. Only his mother had commented on the change, saying that he looked much healthier than he did yesterday meaning he must have been feeling better. The only person who seemed to react the strangest was Betty who, on top of still being angry with Henry over him eyeing Ms. Burrieza yesterday, was glaring at him with scrutiny. Betty definitely wasn't stupid. Henry needed to come up with a plan so that he could lure her off the trail, should more noticeable changes happen tomorrow there was no guarantee that she wouldn't say something to him.

So when not daydreaming, Henry spent the majority of his classes thinking of a solution to his problem. If he was going to pose as another person, he'd need an excuse to be somewhere for that extended period of time. Not to mention there was the issue of finding proper clothing and materials appropriate for being his Spanish teacher.

He was so lost in thought that during his last class, which by chance happened to be Spanish class, he was the last one besides Ms. Burrieza in the room when the final bell rang. Ms. Burrieza was in her usual rush to gather up her things and didn't even notice Henry until she looked up.

"Excuse me. Henry, right?"

Henry jolted in his desk, his brain coming back from it's ten minute coffee break. "Yes ma'am! Sorry, dozed off. I-"

"No, no, my dear. The bell rang. You can go home now is all." she smiled warmly at Henry. He blushed slightly.

"Right, sorry about that..."

He began to gather up his own things to go home, upset with himself because he could not come up with a solution to his plight before school had ended. It looked like things were going to have to be "ab-lib" so to speak.

"Although...While you're here..." muttered Ms. Burrieza before Henry could get to the door.

"Ma'am?" asked Henry. He was somewhat nervous. What if she had noticed something about his skin?

"This goes against what most facility would advise me doing but...Are you busy over the next month or so, Henry?"

"Er...Not exactly. Why?"

"I find myself in a bit of a pickle. I'm supposed to visit my fiance's family in his home country all next month. I've taken the time to mention it to the school, but I couldn't find the time to hire a house sitter. It's my kittens you see, I have two cats that need to be taken care of while I'm away. Would you...?"

Henry smiled and spoke with a poorly filtered enthusiasm, fate had been kind to him this day. "...Want to take care of it for you? I'd be happy to Ms. Burrieza!"

"Really? Wonderful! Please, stay behind after class tomorrow. I'll go over everything that needs to be done. We can discuss any payment you'd like for the job as well."

"There's no need to pay me..."

"Oh, nonsense. This is very short notice after all. Anyway, I really need to run. Take care and see you tomorrow."

Henry watched as the short Spanish woman gathered up a bag that almost seemed too large for her to handle and limped out the door. Talk about a lucky break. He had a place he could stay and for a whole month! All he had to do was think up some excuse to tell his parents so he could live away for that period of time.

"I'll just have to come up with something..."

Later that night...
1131112111.title: Teacher's request.

11311121111.content:
The process of putting on the suit and relaxing after a long day at school was beginning to feel common place already for Henry. He had to wait until dinner was over of course, else his parents would be suspicious, but for all they knew he was studying hard all night. In reality though he was surfing the internet looking for funny videos, occasionally falling of his chair in a fit of laughter.

He had recently made an interesting discovery as he sat there naked in Ms. Burrieza's skin. Everything that would normally be found on the female anatomy was in working order, even the "plumbing". Being a growing boy, he was only curious and decided to spend some time exploring this wonderful and exciting discovery until his mother knocked on his door to check if everything was alright.

Things were going well until his cellphone vibrated on top of his desk. He checked who was calling him, it was Betty.

"Hello?"

"Hi Henry, it's Betty."

"Oh hey, what are you doing calling at this hour?"

"Just wanted to ask you something. Remember that science project that we're supposed to be working on?"

Henry paused slightly. In the midst of all his fun, he had been putting the project off. "...Kinda...Why?"

The line went silent for a few seconds. "You haven't been working on it at all, have you?"

The project she was talking about was the mid term assignment given to them in their Biology class. Their teacher had made the expected scope of it quite clear when he grouped them into partners. Henry and Betty had been selected to group up together, which Henry was thankful for considering Betty's known determination with grades. In fact he had been trying to do his best and research their topic when he had stumbled on the recipe for the skin suit. Needless to say, the project's due date was coming up.

"...I'm sorry Betty, I've just been really distracted lately with other...things...I'll put in a lot of effort this weekend. I promise."

"Oh, don't worry. Actually, I was going to suggest coming over tomorrow so that we could work together on it."

"What? Tomorrow?"

"Right. I'll see you in class tomorrow."

"W-wait, Betty!"

Too late, she had hung up. Henry grunted in annoyance. Just when he had the chance to test the suit further, he had to be stuck doing this stupid science project. Still, it wasn't fair for Betty to be doing all the work herself, and he had been neglecting her lately.

Henry was more worried about what could happen if she discovered the suit. He was still going to go through with wearing the suit overnight, after all there seemed like no going back at this point, but hiding the constant changes was going to prove difficult. He desperately needed an excuse to be somewhere else.

He spent the rest of his night rattling his brain on more ways to hide his secret before passing out in bed. The warmness of the suit put him right to sleep and he passed out playfully twirling the long black hair of the skin. Henry could only hope that nothing noticeable would happen tomorrow that would blow his cover.

The next day...
11311121111.title: Complications.

choices: No one notices and act like nothing's different about him.
113111211111.content:
It was good to be back on a normal sleep schedule again, awakening at five in the morning was not something Henry enjoyed as he reminisced making the Burrieza suit while waking up the next morning. Wearing the suit to sleep still meant that he had to take the time to remove it each morning, which ate up a few precious minutes of sleep he could have had. He grudgingly got to work with removing the skin once again.

It was like it was because easier to remove it though, almost as if his body had been adjusting to it while he slept. Not just on a genetic level but through form as well. Though he didn't seem much shorter this morning, he could swear that his form expanded outwards once he stepped out of the suit like sardines trapped in a tin can. That's also when he noticed the long locks of black hair down in his face.

He went to mirror to find that his short brown hair had been replaced by a thick luscious head of long dark hair. Though it looked almost matted, probably due to being crammed in the suit overnight, Henry could tell that this hair was well taken care of. Especially by the way it sort of bounced when he pulled at it.

"It looks like I'm wearing a wig..." he giggled.

But he was only try to fool himself with a carefree attitude. He had been hoping that something else besides a noticeable physical trait like this would change overnight instead. Someone was sure to pick up on that his hair had suddenly gone from brown to black and grown out to the middle of his back.

He could try cutting it, but what if he needed to disguise himself later as Ms. Burrieza? He didn't have any wigs he could cover it with, and he doubted that his sister would have one of his exact hairstyle. His only option would have to be to hide the hair under a hat of some sorts and pray no one noticed anything.

Feeling somewhat defeated but determined, he stowed away the Burrieza suit in the bag, tossed it into the closet and searched around for a hat that he could wear. He stumbled on an old baseball cap that seemed somewhat small for his head but he could not find anything else. He finished putting it on and his school uniform just before his mom knocked at the door to get him ready for school.

"Be down for breakfast in a minute mom!" he called back.

However, he paused to look at himself in the mirror. He had done his best to hide the volume of hair underneath the cap but little black locks still poked through. If someone were to really pay attention they might notice something was off. This was the best he could do right now though, maybe he could fix it before first period at school.

"Worth a try...I guess..."
113111211111.title: Hair today...

1131112111111.content:
Henry felt nervous from the moment he went downstairs to when he was sitting in his homeroom class in a puddle of sweat. It wasn't like yesterday where people just seemed to ignore him, today it was like every eye in the room was on him. Perhaps he was simply imagining it, but clearly going through two changes in a row and trying to get away with in public was pushing it. Every time he looked around he could have sworn people were looking at him then quickly turning away. He tried to listen in on their whispers but couldn't hear anything.

Earlier in the bathroom he had tried to fix up his new hairdo so that it could stay completely hidden under the hat, nothing seemed to work though and he was seriously considering cutting off some so it'd be less apparent.

"I gotta think of some way I can hide until the transformation is finished..." he mumbled to himself, head down on the desk and gripping his cap in frustration.

In reality, no one was really paying much attention to him this early in the morning. It was only his wild imagination and fear of getting caught that caused him to feel under scrutiny. There was one person who hadn't stopped staring at him since he walked into class though.

Betty had been scanning him over all morning. She sat a few chairs behind him so he didn't notice her. Secretly, she had a small notebook with several details written in them as she observed Henry through the class. Several times between class periods she considered approaching Henry, but was saving it for later that day when they were to work on their science project (which Henry had been neglecting once again).

Henry was exhausted from constantly looking over his shoulder by the time Spanish class rolled around. He decided the best thing to do to ease his mind was to observe Ms. Burrieza again, he carefully made a mental note as to how she walked and spoke. The little ticks in her speech and any physical habits that may have come in handy in the near future. Though many people didn't consider Henry to be all that bright, he had an exceptional talent for understanding people and their natural tendencies though he rarely used it wisely.

Finally, the bell rang and his day in hell was over. He waited until all the students left the room again, with Betty giving him a bitter stare as she passed by him, before going up to Ms. Burrieza.

"I'm glad you're still interested in helping me out Henry," she smiled at him with a huge look of relief. "I honestly wouldn't know where else to turn if you didn't accept."

"It's no trouble at all miss, I don't have much to do during next month anyway and could use a job."

"That's wonderful to hear, I'm sorry I won't have time to show you around the place. I leave tomorrow after all...I didn't even have time to tell Mr. Cardell that I needed to leave. It was all very short notice you see."

Mr. Cardell was the principle of the school, if he didn't know that Ms. Burrieza was taking a month long break yet then this would work very well to Henry's advantage.

"I'll mail a letter back home once we've landed. Would it be trouble for you to give him that letter for me?"

"No ma'am, no trouble at all."

"Anyway, here's a list of things that you'll need to do everyday. I really need to hurry home and pack before the flight leaves in two hours...There's an emergency number at the bottom, just call me if you have any questions or problems."

Henry gave the warmest smile he could manage. "You can count on me."

"Great!" she smiled back, lifting up her heavy bag. "Now if you'll excuse me...I'll see you in a month Mr. Folker."

"Bye," waved Henry as the funny short Spanish woman waddled out.

"Well that's done..." he mumbled to himself. "Now I just have to deal with Betty for today..."
1131112111111.title: Silent observer.

11311121111111.content:
Once he got home, Henry immediately went to check on the Burrieza skin suit just to make sure it hadn't been discovered again. When his fears were relieved, he picked a new hiding spot for it under his bed. Even when Betty came over, so long as he didn't leave the room he could keep an eye on it.

"Hope she gets here soon," he said to himself while scratching his scalp. His head felt like it was burning with itches due to his long hair being cooped up in a hat all day and he didn't want to take it off because there was always the chance Betty would pop in unannounced. She and your family knew each other well enough that it would be a distinct possibility.

So Henry decided to kill time by doing at least a little research for their science project before Betty arrived. Not even fifteen minutes into his studying did he hear a knock on his door.

"Honey, Betty's here," said his mother. "She says you're both going to work on a science project."

"Yeah, okay mom. Send her in."

Betty came into his room with an odd look of sanctification on her face that Henry instantly recognized. It was the same look she gave when she had him in checkmate back when they played chess. She tossed her backpack down and crossed her arms.

"So, I started doing some research..." began Henry.

"Where is it?"

"I haven't printed it out yet but-"

"Not the research for the stupid science project, Henry. Where's the suit?"

Henry froze, which probably gave him away. He tried to recover by lying. "I-I don't have any idea what you're-"

He didn't have time to finish as Betty jumped at him and made a grab for his hat. Instinctively, Henry clasped his own hands around the brim and fought hard to keep the cap on his head. Both of them tumbled to the floor and started wrestling back and forth until finally Betty held up the baseball hat triumphantly.

"Hah, I knew it!" she smirked.

Henry sat up on his back, long strands of black hair cover his face so that he had to brush it out of the way in order to see properly. Though feeling defeated, it also felt good to finally give his long hair some air.

"How did you know?" he mumbled.

"Oh come on Henry. You show up to school with all those weird changes and you don't expect your best friend to notice? Besides, you do remember what we were supposed to be researching, right?"

"...The uses plastic in the modern day?"

"Exactly. That article on human replicated suits was too interesting to pass up."

"So...Have you tried the recipe then?"

"Please. I didn't think it would actually work, I just read through it for references. But to think it actually would work though...Can I see it?"

"I guess there's no point in hiding it anymore, is there?" sighed Henry.

Betty grinned. "Nope."

He went and dug around beneath his bed and pulled out the bag. He then tossed it to Betty who carefully opened it as if she were dealing with hazardous material. When she removed the suit she grabbed it using her clothes, preventing herself from physically touching it all times.

"It doesn't have the plague you know," Henry said, somewhat amused by her actions.

"Better safe than sorry," she snapped back. "From what I read the chemicals involved in making this thing are meant to seep into the human body. It's remarkable that they come together to make something so... distinguishable. But really Henry, Ms. Burrieza?"

Blushing, Henry rubbed the back of his head. "Yeah...Well, it seemed like a good idea at the time. Plus she asked me to watch her house while she goes on vacation for the next month."

"And those are the only reasons?"

"Yes," lied Henry.

The whole time Betty's eyes never left the suit. She was almost testing it, it's stretchiness and it's durability. A few times she even dared to touch it with her bare skin, feeling how soft and smooth it was and how it almost tingled to the touch.

"You aren't going to tell anyone about this, are you Betty?"

She turned to him and smiled.
11311121111111.title: Some studying with Betty.

choices: Yes, go through with the plan.
113111211111112.content:
"No, but there's a catch," she had a look on her face that made Henry mouth the words "Uh oh."

"What do you want...?" he replied with a groan.

"Oh relax Henry, it's nothing that's going to affect you in anyway. Well, besides me keeping the secret, of course."

She started pacing around the room slightly, still fiddling with the skin suit. "Remember my ex-boyfriend who broke up with me? Andrew?"

How could Henry forget? Just an hour after that fiasco had happened Betty had called him while sobbing over the other line. She took that breakup particularly hard and it took several hours for Henry to finally talk her down. She wasn't quite the same since, but that was over a month ago.

"Yes..."

"Well, I'd like for you to make me a suit of him so I can have a little revenge."

"What?!" Of all the things Henry thought Betty capable of, the lowest thing on the list was revenge. "You gotta be kidding me Betty."

Betty seemed almost offended by Henry's sudden remark. "Why? Is there something wrong?"

"It's just...You're going to use a suit for petty revenge? And on Andrew? I'm mean...He and I aren't the best of friends, but he's a pretty cool guy."

"No, not on Andrew. On that little bitch he calls a girlfriend."

Henry could tell that Betty was getting angry, she usually kept a calm demeanor even under the most hectic circumstances. It was very rare to hear her swear and even more unheard of for her to name call someone like that. The "bitch" she was referring to was actually one of the girls Henry had a crush on, Emily Ward. She was a well known popular girl at school who typically made Betty's life a living hell. Henry recalled the day after Andrew and Betty broke up, Emily went up to her and flaunted her victory causing Betty to run out of the cafeteria in tears.

"She stole Andrew. I know she did. I'm going to make her regret ever doing that to me."

"Calm down Bet, you're kinda scaring me."

Henry offered a pat of reassurance on her back. "Anyway, I don't think you should use the suits for revenge like that."

"Oh, and I suppose they're meant to be used for some sexual joyride?" she snapped back at him.

"Hey now..."

"Look, Henry. I'm going to offer more to you than just my silence. You remember what the prize was for the science fair last semester, right?"

"No, why's that matter?"

Betty sighed. "A trip for two to Seattle for about a month."

Henry still wasn't getting it. Betty knocked him on the head and tried to explain things more clearly. "So...Didn't Ms. Burrieza leave for a month?"

"Yeah..." replied Henry.

"And don't you need an excuse to experiment on the suit?"

"Right..." he was slowly starting to get it. "But my parents aren't going to buy me leaving school for a month."

"It won't be for a month, it'll only be for three weeks. You'll need the extra week to get back to your normal self before Ms. Burrieza comes back. And secondly, I'll be the one to tell your parents. Your parents love me, after all. They'll believe anything I tell them."

That was true. For some reason, ever since they were kids, Henry's parents had been trying to hook him up with Betty. And if Betty were the one who told them he was invited to go on a trip alone with her...

Betty continued explaining the plan. "I'll tell them tonight on my way out. We'll 'leave' on Saturday, but in reality once we get dropped off at the airport we'll just call a cab and head to Ms. Burrieza's house. There we can spend the next three weeks doing whatever we want with the suits."

"So what you're suggesting is living in another person's house for almost a month? That can't be legal...Also, if you need a suit so bad why not make one yourself."

"You've seen my house. There's only one bathroom, I can't make a suit overnight when there's a chance someone will notice it. And no one's going to notice if you go around posing as Ms. Burrieza, right?"

Henry went over the plan several times through his head. So far, there didn't appear to be any gaping holes in it. Betty had really thought this through, and Henry was desperately looking for a way to disappear for the next month. Perhaps this was exactly what he needed.

"What about your parents? Will they trust me to go alone with you to Seattle?"

"Oh, my parents know your parents. And they know you. You're probably the only guy they'd let me do it with. Though they'll probably check up on me every day."

Henry frowned as Betty seemed to grow more impatient.

"Well? Do we have a deal?"
113111211111112.title: There's always a catch...

choices: There is only a minor change.
1131112111111121.content:
"Like I have a choice?" asked Henry as he shook Betty's hand.

"Good! Now why don't you get to work on the suit while I take care of the project here."

"Wait, didn't come over so we could work on the science project together?"

But Betty was already immersed in a few packets of printed paper. "Oh please, Henry. You and I both know that I was doing most of this work anyway. Besides, this will take me two hours to do alone."

"Then I'll feel like I didn't do anything..."

"Just consider this part of our deal then," smiled Betty. "To just back back at that little...whore...I'd have done your homework for the rest of the school year, so don't worry about it so much okay?"

Henry suddenly felt like he was being cheated, but he didn't care. So long as Betty didn't reveal anything about the suit she could do whatever she wanted. He put his cap back on and crept downstairs to gather up the chemicals and supplies he needed to make another suit. His mother caught him once but he simply explained that they needed the odd materials for a visual aid in class, so she let him go.

After about an hour of scavenging hunting, he filled his bathtub with warm water and placed the ingredients in again just like he had a few days ago. The concoction stunk up the bathroom with a plastic-like smell once again, but the recipe was complete. All Henry needed was a bit of Andrew's hair from Betty.

He returned to his bedroom floor to discover Betty sitting cross legged in the middle of a mountain of books and printed sheets. There was a small pile of index cards in front of her no doubt filled with data for their speech on the topic they were to present the next day. She didn't even notice Henry approach her until he tapped her on the shoulder.

"Oh god, Henry! You scared me!"

"Sorry, it looks like you've been working hard."

"I have, in fact I've almost finished faster than I expected to. Can you say the same?"

"Yeah, don't worry. Everything is ready to go, all I need now is a bit of hair from Andrew. You can give it to me tomorrow, I guess."

"No need to wait," replied Betty as she absentmindedly tossed a plastic vial at Henry. As he fumbled around to catch it, he saw that it had a single short black hair in it.

"...How prepared are you for this?" asked Henry.

"Oh, I've been preparing the whole day. I kind of figured that you wouldn't refuse my offer. Besides, the sooner the better. Right?"

Henry growled lowly. He didn't enjoy feeling predictable like that. "I guess so..."

Betty slammed the book she was reading shut. "Anyway, seeing as you don't need me here anymore I can finish up the rest at home."

"Shouldn't I study what you've written though? I mean, we're supposed to give the speech together aren't we?"

"Don't worry, I'll be stopping by here early tomorrow morning to pick up the suit. I'll give you the speech then once I safely get the skin. Call it collateral payment."

"You'd really think I'd not hand over the suit after all you're going to do for me Betty? I thought we were friends..."

"We are...It's just...I'm normally not a spiteful person, but this means a great deal to me Henry," she looked at him with a pair of sad eyes. "I want nothing to go wrong with what I have planned. You're a friend and I do trust you, but this is personal. Do you understand?"

"Not really, but since when did that stop me?"

Betty suddenly gave Henry a big hug. "Thanks Henry...Now, you should probably get some sleep. The teacher will be grading us on how we present ourselves, that means no yawning in the middle of our topic."

"I get it, I get it..."

"Alright," she said, gathering up the books and papers. "I'm heading off then. We'll discuss the plan for Saturday in more detail tomorrow. See you in the morning."

"Right, see you..."

He waited until she shut the door before undressing and finding the Burrieza suit again. There had been a strange carving to put it on the entire time Betty was there, something about the warmth the suit generated. Slowly, it was feeling more and more homely than making around in his own body. But he didn't dare voice his concerns to Betty, not while she offered the chance to escape for an entire month. To live for awhile as someone else, there was something wrong and foreign yet warm and inviting about that thought.

Henry spent the remainder of the night sitting naked in the suit browsing the internet. The next day...
1131112111111121.title: Yes, go through with the plan.

11311121111111211.content:
When Henry woke up the next day, the first thing different he noticed was that the sheets seemed to feel a whole lot heavier than usual. In fact, for some reason the suit feel more tighter. Like it had been constricting him the whole night. Before he went to bed last night, he had forgotten to wear any night clothing. Not that it mattered, the suit always seemed to keep him warm that it hardly felt necessary.

Sitting up, Henry looked down at himself and didn't see anything noticeably different yet. His chest was still flat, so he wouldn't have to go to school with massive breasts. But it wasn't until he stood up did he realize something was clearly off.

He felt shorter. A lot shorter. Everything in his room seemed a whole lot bigger, he couldn't see over his wardrobe like he normally could. Rushing over to his doorway where he had kept a constant record of his height over the years, he discovered that the markings of his last few years of measurements now towered over his head. Where he had been a little over six feet tall, he now stood a little ways under five feet. The exact height of Ms. Burrieza.

The realization of just what was happening to him suddenly sunk in. "Whoa..."

He hadn't been this height since he was in elementary school. Had his body really changed so rapidly that he could become this small in such short time span? It didn't seem like it was possible where as he would have believed it just last night. Henry just stood there, taking in the rare and surreal view he was now granted.

"Hey there, shorty." said a voice behind him.

Betty was sitting on his windowsill smirking and watching him intently. It was almost like she was studying his reaction to the sudden change. Almost instinctively, Henry blushed and covered up his chest and private areas.

"Couldn't you have knocked?"

"And miss watching you wander around in a daze like that? Too funny to pass up."

Henry truly felt tiny once Betty walked up to him. Normally she was a good seven or so inches shorter than him. Now he had to look up at her, she was clearly amused by the predicament judging by how she gently patted him on the head.

"Is the suit ready?"

"I don't know, I haven't checked yet."

"Well, what are we waiting for?"

Henry led her into his bathroom while he grabbed a pile of clothes to cover himself with. Like the day he discovered the Burrieza suit waiting for him, there was a flattened skin drowned in clear bath water when they looked into the tub. The face was crumpled but Henry recognized it as Andrew's for certain. He reached in and scooped it out, handing it dripping with water to Betty.

"That's it then?" she asked. "Huh, I was expecting there to be more to it. Simply amazing..."

She played with the stretchiness of the suit for a few moments before reaching into her backpack and handing Henry a pile of cards. Each card was covered in notes but some sections were highlighted in a blue highlighter.

"Here's the whole list of things we should talk about during the presentation. I highlighted your sections for you, so you'll only have to review that. But it wouldn't hurt to read through everything in case the teacher asks you a question."

As she was explaining things to him, she took out a large plastic bag from her backpack and began folding the Andrew suit inside of it.

"Oh, and you might want to find something that will make you seem taller. Someone might notice something, short stuff."

Henry grunted. "Are you going to make fun of that the whole time?"

Betty gave a big smile back. "Yup. Anyway, we can talk later about the plans for tomorrow after school today. I already had my mom call your mom and she agreed to let you go on the trip, so things are mostly all set. For now, you should study the flashcards and make sure you don't make us look bad during our presentation."

Once she packed up everything, she headed for the window again. "I'll see you at school Henry, thanks again."

"Yeah, no problem."

He watched her climb down the side of his house and disappear into the dim morning light on the street. After he shut the window, Henry turned and faced his school uniform. It looked positively gigantic for him now.

"This might be a problem though..."

113111211111112111.content:
Henry felt like a child who was forced to wear their older sibling's hand-me-down clothes. His once fitting shirt covered his torso like a blanket and there was no way his pants were going to stay around his waist. Finding a creative solution, Henry tucked in his shirt and grabbed the smallest belt he could find from his closet. The idea at least kept his clothing on, though it made him look strange and awkward. For shoes he had to dig up a pair of his old pairs from middle school. Lastly, he put on the cap he had worn yesterday to cover his hair.

It wasn't perfect, but at least it would last a day and that was all he would need. Starting tomorrow he'd be mostly alone in a house and wouldn't have to worry about what people thought. Well, at least he wouldn't be uncomfortable around Betty like this.

When he went downstairs, he tried his best to avoid standing next to his family so that they wouldn't notice his significant drop in height. Everyone was too involved with their breakfast to notice anything different, though his mother gave him a concerned look.

"You look somewhat sickly, honey. Are you sure you're feeling well enough to go on that trip with Betty?"

Right, Betty had said she had gotten permission for him about the 'trip'. "Oh yeah, mom. Just have a little cold."

"Well if you're sure..."

After he gobbled up a quick bite, he raced out to the car before his family could get a good look at him. He waited patiently for his mother to arrive, who was looking more and more distressed by her son's unusual behavior.

"You've never been this eager to get to school, dear."

"I'm fine mom, just need to get there early so I can practice the presentation with Betty."

"Alright then..."

~

School didn't go much better. Henry didn't realize how tall some of the people in his class were as he traveled through the crowded hallways. Poor Ms. Burrieza probably had a tough time navigating through them during the rush between classes. Thankfully, his tall classmates provided excellent cover from wandering eyes and no one seemed to see him as he made his way to and from his locker.

When he finally sat down in his seat, Henry gave a breath of relief.

"Having fun running around, shortie?" said Betty who was sitting directly behind him.

"Shut up..."

"Right, maybe you shouldn't wear the 'you know what' tonight. I doubt your mom would be unconcerned about sending her son off to Seattle when he mysteriously grew a massive rack overnight."

"Yeah, you're probably right about that..."

There was always time to wear the suit again after all. Even though the instructions said he'd slowly lose the traits of the person he was channeling, returning back to his normal height for one day would be better than spending it dodging people's footsteps.

"Ready for the project?" asked Betty. "I think we should go first. You know, in case people wonder about your shorter frame. That way they'll forget about it by the end of class."

"Sounds good."

As the bell rang, the rest of their class fumbled in followed by their eccentric science teacher Professor Farwell. Farwell was an elderly with a crown of hair that jutted out from the sides with a giant bald spot in the center. If he titled his head over he'd probably look like a flower almost because his white hair was stained yellow from smoking. In his usual jittery manner, he greeted the class.

"Good morning young apprentices! As you all are probably aware, our class presentations are today! I won't waste time talking then, since we have much to do. I'll leave the board open to anyone who wants to go first."

Betty raised her hand. "We'll go, professor."

"Excellent, I expected as much from the ever magnificent Ms. Bleu! Mr. Folker too. Pay attention class, let's give these two our respect."

The moment Henry got up and moved to the front of the class with Betty he could hear the whispering in the class.

"Has Henry always been that short or is it just me?"

"Huh, Folker is a lot smaller than I remember him being."

Henry tried to ignore the stares as Betty started up the power point presentation on the computer. The projector hummed to life as it shot a blue light at the board. The screen for the projector wasn't coming down though.

"Oh my, looks like the screen's stuck again," said Professor Farwell in the back of the room. "Mister Folker, can you reach up and pull it down? Just give it a good tug."

Easier said than done. Under normal circumstances Henry would have been able to reach the screen with no problem, but being as short as he was now the handle for the screen was a good foot out of reach.

After several unsuccessful attempts of jumping up at it, Betty finally stepped in and provided Henry with a small boost. The entire class snickered at the sight and Henry blushed as he pulled the screen down at last.

"Now, now. Give them our respect class!"

"Thank you, Professor," said Betty who was trying to maintain a professional look. "Now to begin our report on the modern uses of plastic..."
113111211111112111.title: The presentation.

1131112111111121111.content:
After the incident with the projector screen, the presentation went on without a hitch. Of course Betty did most of the talking, she had a way with making even the dull components of plastic sound interesting. All Henry had to do was add in a few comments to make it seem like he had done part of the research as well though he felt like his pants were going to fall off the whole time he stood around at the front of the class.

Finally, in a brief fifteen minutes they reached the last slide of the power point and the class gave them a round of applause. The both of them took their seats as Henry shot a whisper to Betty.

"I owe you for that."

"No way, with what I'm getting I got off cheap." she smiled in return.

Betty spent the rest of the day following Henry around, possibly to give him a bit of protection. He felt so small around the rest of their classmates that he was afraid someone might mistake him for a tiny middle school class-man. It wasn't hard for Betty to keep an eye on him, they shared most of the same classes together after all.

Eventually it was lunchtime and the both of them picked a quiet spot in the back of the cafeteria to eat at. Henry had a plate of his usual meal consisting of a hamburger and fries but for some reason he just couldn't finish it all.

"It's probably because your body is so much smaller, it doesn't need as much food to sustain itself," explained Betty between gulps of her salad.

"Maybe. It's still very weird though. This whole experience is."

"You could have always waited until we went on the 'trip'. It's not like there's any hurry now."

Henry grunted. She was right, but he didn't want to tell her about the strange urge he had been getting. Part of him was enjoying this too much to slow down. Still, he would have to not wear the suit before he went to sleep tonight. If he was going to say good bye to his parents tomorrow before leaving, it was too risky to have a chance that he'd change again.

"People keep giving me these off looks."

"That's why I'm spending the rest of the day with you. Trust me, I'll defend you if anyone goes up and questions you."

They both shared a warm smile and returned to discussing their plans for the next month. Betty planned to use her own suit a week after it appeared they left for Seattle so she'd avoid any connection with what she had planned. Henry brought up the idea of possibly making more suits, which Betty seemed intrigued by.

"Just think, we could make an entire closet of these things. A suit for every person in our class."

"We'd still need the hairs of those people. Besides, they take awhile to make and don't make the best instant disguises." Henry referred to the slow physical change into the other person.

"Mmm. True. But if judging by the experiments you've done with them so far, it takes twelve hours for one change to happen. So if you were to wear a suit all day..."

But Henry got distracted by the crowd of girls suddenly forming around their table. He recognized a lot of them, they were the 'popular' crowd which meant that Emily Ward was probably nearby. Sure enough, the popular blonde came to the front of the group.

"Aw, look at the little Betty having lunch with her crush," she said with an almost teeth grinding sweet voice.

"Emily." Betty replied, simply glaring at her. "I didn't think they'd allow dogs to eat in the cafeteria."

Henry sensed an impending fight. "Laugh it up smart girl, who's going to be laughing when Andrew takes me to the dance next Friday."

"So what? Enjoy it while you can."

"Aw. There, there little Betty. I know you're upset because I won Andrew over and just after he decided to do some charity work and go out with you too."

The rest of the girls laughed loudly as Betty's face turned beet red. Emily continued in her cruel mocking game.

"You didn't think a guy like Andrew would be interested in you, did you? In fact when I asked him he told me that the only reason he even bothered to start dating you in the first place was because he lost a bet with a friend-"

"Alright, that's enough!" shouted Henry, surprised by the volume of his own voice.

The girls all just laughed at him instead, Henry didn't realize it but in his burst of rage he had stood up. His shortened height didn't even come close to the length of any of the girls. They all towered over him.

"Betty's little man decides to stand up for her, how adorable." mocked Emily as Henry's own face blushed. "Come on girls, let's go before the tiny thing wears itself out."

Satisfied with their victory, the group left laughing like a barn of hens. Henry tried to comfort Betty who had her head buried in her hands, no doubt doing her best not to burst out into sobs. He understood now why Betty was so desperate for revenge. How weak and powerless she must have felt while Emily attacked her safely surrounded by a group of friends to back her up.

"I hate her Henry, I just...hate her so much."
1131112111111121111.title: Betty's plight.

11311121111111211111.content:
Henry and Betty's anticipation for the last bell could not be matched even by the school of students eager to get home for the weekend. Both of them just wanted to be out of there, Henry to escape the constant stares he was getting due to his height and Betty to begin preparations for her grand revenge.

They decided to walk home together to prevent from being overheard. "So, you know the plan Henry tonight, right? You're not to wear the suit."

"Yes, okay. I get it Betty." He was growing tired of having to look up to her all day. His neck was sore.

"And I'll be by with my parents to drop us off at the airport at around nine o'clock."

"Alright Betty."

"After that we'll hail a cab to take us to Ms. Burrieza's house which you have the address for and-"

"Oh. Kay. Betty." Henry repeated with an annoyed tone. He regretted speaking to her like that instantly as though Betty seemed to get the message, she remained quiet for most of the walk home. The only time she said anything to him was when he got to the door of his house and whispered "bye".

"I'll text her an apology later." thought Henry as he rushed to his room.

He ignored his mother's hello and his younger sister's angry shouts as he stepped over her barbies. He made a beeline straight for his bedroom door and slammed it shut before locking it. Though Betty told him not to wear the suit, he couldn't help it.

Within minutes, he had stripped himself and was laying comfortably on his bed with the suit touching himself all over. It was like an addiction that was consuming him, he had to wear the suit once day or else. The worst part was once he had in on, he didn't want to leave it.

He wasn't going to be stupid with it though, he checked his clock. It read "4:12 PM".

"I'll just take it off before dinner..." which he estimated would be before or around seven. "That way I'll still have over twelve hours to revert day to normal."

He smiled contently as he continued to gloss over his stomach and into some of the more sensitive areas of his body. Everything was going to go according to plan. This was the most pleasure and the most fun he had ever had.

The next day...
11311121111111211111.title: Addiction.

113111211111112111111.content:
Henry woke up a sweaty mess under the cover of his bed sheets. At first he jumped up, thinking that he had accidentally worn the skin suit to bed and possibly ruined Betty and his plans for the day. He quickly discovered, however, that he was not wearing it and was instead standing in the middle of the room naked. The suit was lying in a crumpled pile on the floor next to his bed.

He shuddering slightly and quickly tossed the suit into his closet. If someone had walked in while he was asleep, they would have seen it and found him out. Worse, he could not even remember taking it off last night. The only thing still fresh in his mind was a sensation of indescribable pleasure as he had touched himself while wearing the suit.

Perhaps he had been lucky and slipped out of the skin just before he passed out from ecstasy. Everything was strange now, being back to his normal size again after spending the day at Ms. Burrieza's height, though he still had her hair and skin.

A sudden buzz coming from his nightstand snapped him back to reality. His cellphone was buzzing from a text message. As he reached for the phone, he noticed that his clock read "8:22 AM", he had really spent all that time cooped up in his room without even noticing it?

The text was from Betty, written in her usual brief yet grammatically correct manner. Usually though, she had a more friendly greeting towards Henry.

"Hey. Hope you are ready. We're coming over to pick you up."

In five full seconds, what Betty had meant finally hit Henry like a speeding train. Scrambling like a madman, Henry tore open his closet again and tossed out everything he could grab. A suitcase, some clothes, and most importantly the suit. He ran from the closet to his dresser and did the same, grabbing an outfit for him to wear instead of his birthday suit. He made sure to hide his long black hair under the same cap he had been using for the past few days.

When all the junk he had collected was stuffed to the brim in his suitcase, he gave a sigh of relief and looked back at the clock. Two minutes until eight thirty, he had made it. He hurried downstairs and reached the kitchen just in time for the doorbell to ring.

"Oh, that must be Betty," said Henry's mom who was currently cooking breakfast for the family. "I'll get it, perhaps they'll have time for a quick bite before you guys head off, Henry."

Henry knocked and threw down his suitcase to eat a much earned breakfast. This was probably going to be the last home cooked meal he would have for a while, there would be nothing but take out and junk food for the next month.

Several mouthfuls of cinnamon toast later, Henry's mother returned with Betty next to her. "...Henry is all ready to go, is there anything you will need on the trip that we can provide?"

Betty smiled, though Henry could tell it was forced. "Don't worry, Mrs. Folker. My parents are taking care of everything, we'll be fine for the next month. Though we really must hurry, the flight leaves at nine."

"Oh, I understand. You two take care. Especially you Henry, I don't know why but it feels like I never see you much lately. Be sure to text me every day."

"Mmkay, mmth." mumbled Henry as he shoved the remainder of his breakfast into his mouth and got up to leave with Betty. His mom stopped him to give him a hug good bye.

"Have fun you two."
113111211111112111111.title: Morning rush.

1131112111111121111111.content:
The ride to the airport was deathly quiet. Mostly Betty's parents did all of the talking, asking the both Henry and Betty questions about what they planned to do once they landed and going over procedures. Nearly all of the talk was lost on Henry, who let Betty do most of the talking. Not once though did she mention Henry in their "planned" endeavors, nor did she even look at him.

"Well, here's the airport kids." said Betty's mother after fifteen minutes of driving. "We'll drop you off, after that you're on your own."

"Thanks mom, I'll call you when we get there." Replied Betty as she stepped out of the car with her suitcase.

Henry followed suit, grabbing his own tightly packed suitcase and staying close to her. Betty smiled at her parents and waved goodbye, waiting for them to drive out of sight before turning to Henry for the first time all morning.

"Alright, we're ready to go."

"About time, I thought you were going to ignore me to death today. Or was that part of your plan?"

"In a way." She smirked, pulling out her cellphone and dialing a number.

"Yeah, we're ready." she said to the person on the other end.

"Who was that?" Henry asked.

"Our ride."

In a short thirty seconds, a yellow cab pulled up to the pair and a short chubby man with a golfer hat waddled out of the front seat.

"How's it going, Betty?" the man smiled showing a pair of golden teeth.

"Great, sorry for the trouble Mister Golbloom."

Golbloom grabbed her suitcase for her. "No trouble, no trouble at all. Besides everyone needs a little away time from the folks after all, right? What's this guy's story anyway? He your boyfriend? Awfully tan..."

Both Betty and Henry blushed, but it was Betty who denied it. "No! He's just giving me a hand with this project."

"Right, right. I won't say a word. Where are you headed anyway?"

"Henry?" Betty asked, nudging him as the two sat down in the backseat of the cab.

"Oh, right." He handed Golbloom the note with Ms. Burrieza's home address on it.

"Huh, not too far from here. You guys just sit back and let me handle this."

Sure enough, twenty minutes later, they were in front of a small middle class white home complete with a picket fence and a beautiful garden. Betty and Henry double checked to make sure they had everything before exiting the cab and saying their good byes to Mr. Golbloom. The cab driver sped off out of sight, leaving the two teenagers to their own devices. The first thing they did was...

1211122.content:
After coming to a quick decision; Henry shed the clothes, throwing them back into his sister's room, and took off the suit the same way it went on, rapidly getting redressed in his own clothes. Not long after, Betty started to murmur on the floor. Henry rushed to her side and started shaking her, "Come on Bet, wake up!". One well aimed slap later and Betty was back in the real world.
"OW!" she exclaimed sitting bolt upright, almost headbutting Henry to the ground. "What was that for!?", she seemed genuinely angry.
Acting as if the previous incident never happened, Henry looked at her saying hautily "Gee Bet, I don't know, perhaps it had something to do with you fainting! What was that all about hey?"
Getting to her feet, Betty looked dizzily around the room, "I could have sworn I saw...". She stopped at that looking quite puzzled, staring deeply into Henry's eyes.
"Well you saw my sister, screamed, and collapsed if that helps", Henry innocently proffered. A look of relief swept over Betty but she kept quiet. "Now about this term's science project, potato clocks have been done to death, how about...". They talked and planned about their entry to the school's science fayre for half an hour. Betty looked at her watch and sighed. "What's the matter Bet?"
"Oh, its nothing, or at least nothing can be done about it now, end of story", she glared at Henry, daring him to question further. Getting the hint, and realizing from remembering how Betty was this morning that her being here might mean that she did have a date but cancelled, Henry asked "Hey, how about we stop with the schoolwork now, go downstairs, I'll get us both a slice of cake, and we play that new super mario thing on the tv?"
Betty picked up her gaze from the floor and looked directly at him, her dark grey eyes glinting from the light of the setting sun, "yeah, that'd be... nice". This was the first time that Henry had ever asked her to do anything with him that didn''t have any link with school, and she knew it too. They both left Henry's bedroom silently and went down the stairs, Henry went to get the cake then they sat down and played the game. It was nice to be doing something different for a change, but Henry was a little afraid of what Betty might make of this new dimension to their friendship. Hearing the door slam, Henry looked round see who it was. His little sister Chloe came in, the same one he was blaming the fainting on. Chloe was 14, soon to be 15, but only a few cm shorter than Henry. She was slimly built and ran cross country several times a week with a club. Her thick chestnut hair naturally suspended itself upwards for half an inch before sweeping down to just below her shoulders, the suspension made her hair bounce slightly everytime she made a step.
"Hey Henry, I'm back from Amelia's, oooooh Mario! Can I play too? Oh hi there Betty, didn't see you there, Henry make you play with him eh?", Chloe sat down with them and reached for a spare controller.
"Its alright Chloe, you can have mine, I'm just leaving." Betty sprang up, a little flustered, "See you tomorrow Henry and, erm sorry about before Chloe..." and with that she dashed off.
"What's she apologizing to me for?" inquired Chloe.
"I dunno, must have mistaken you for someone else..."

After playing a few games with Chloe to prevent any suspisions, Henry got back to his room. He had just closed his door when something came through the printer, even though he thought that he'd turned his computer off. It said:
"To those to whom this may concern, we are pleased to inform you that as of 18:43, of this day of mailing, all created and future suits have been upgraded from being a mere item of clothing to a disguise which will alter your mass, height and all other body proportions. It is important to consider that these following times coincide with the changes which will now occur when you put the suit on, and will happen in reverse when the suit is removed. As always, we hope that this will push us one step closer to our dreams, whatever they may be. The warmest regards...
Times (from putting on the suit): Height change, 1/2 day. Weight change, 1 day. Skin colour change, 2 days. Breast growth/reduction, 2 days. Eye colour, 2.5 days. Hair colour/length/style change, 3 days. Facial features, 5 days. Age, 5 days. Voice, 10 days. Replacement of sexual organs (if applicable), 10 days. Aesthetic changes (e.g. tattoos, scars), 11 days. All other genetic and non-genetic changes, 1 month. After 2 years, if suit is removed changes will have become permanant and aging will be restarted. If suit is removed before 2 years, these times will apply to the restoration of your original figure."

Henry read this message a couple of times over, it didn't make sense, all these changes had happened instantly when he tried on the Betty suit before. Was this thing seriously trying to tell him that now the suits would not only disguise him, but that they would actually change him if he kept them on long enough. But at least it said they would wear off if he took the suit off. Henry was a little confused still, "Could I test this out at all?"

He stepped into Betty, wiggling his toes into the right places. Rolling the suit up to his waist, he watched as his hairy white legs dissappeared to be replaced with Betty's hairless, lightly tanned ones. Sitting on his bed with Betty's open mouth tight around his waist, he started to roll it up to the top, sqeezing his arms in as he went, gone were his finger-bitten nails and in their place, Betty's manicured ones. Reaching over the back of his head he caught his fingers on the top lip and heaved it over the top like a balaclava he then readjusted the face so that his eyes could see through the holes and there was no gap between the suit's lips and his. Like before, he didn't feel any different except that there was a constant, somewhat comforting, pressure around every part of his body. A quick look at his bedside alarm clock, it was 6:52, easily enough time to see what the new effects supposedly did.
The house was deserted except for him so Henry decided to go and look at his new body in the main, full length hall mirror. Again, just like before, he looked exactly like Betty if someone was to just look quickly at him. If they looked a little closer and knew Betty then they would realize that he wasn't the real deal. He was too tall for a start, he was more flat chested as well, a little over an A cup. "O.K", thought Henry, "this is no different from the last time, but I suppose I should give it the time it says it needs to work...". Sitting down with his cheese sandwich, Henry started doing a bit of homework. He decided against wearing any clothes, he'd put PJs on when he went to bed but for now his own clothes didn't really appeal to him and he didn't want to go hunt down any of his sister's in case she noticed. After working for an hour or so, he decided to take a little break and take the plate his sandwich was on downstairs in case his mum came looking for it. It felt strange to be walking like this, everything felt so smooth and even though his suit hadn't exactly filled out, he was still more top heavy than before. Coming back up the stairs, he paused infront of the mirror again, still no difference, but the time hadn't gone by yet. After a little more work, Henry decided that even though it was only 8:50, he'd go to bed. He pulled on his pyjamas and clambered into his bed. For some reason, the covers felt thicker than before and he felt more snug than he'd ever been. Lying there with his now long, curly black hair fanned out around his head, he fell asleep.
Waking up to the sound of his radio alarm, Henry sat upright in bed. It was seven o'clock in the morning and time to see if anything had changed. The suit felt a little tighter than before but the tightness felt like it was subsiding, as if it had recently been squeezed really tightly but now was relaxing again. Swinging his legs out from under the covers, he definately had to reach further out for his feet to hit the floor. Standing up straight, it was now clear to Henry that he was at least 20cm shorter than before, he knew that he used to be 1.84 metres tall but now, after measuring himself against the wall, he was now in at 1.63. A wave of excitement ran through him,"It works!", he thought to himself, quite astounded. Running to the face mirror in his ensuite, he had to readjust it so that he could see himself, he had certainly changed.
Now it came to taking the suit off. It came off no bother but he was a little put out to have to take it off, maybe he could take the day off sick so that he could see even more of these new changes... He suddenly realized that although he had taken off the suit for now, he had not returned to his normal size. Checking the sheet, it seemed that it would take the same length of time for the effect to wear off. He would have to go to school wearing too big clothes and noticably shorter, someone was bound to see something was up. His mind wandered back to his first idea of trying to persuade his mum to take the day off...

No one had said anything to him about his clothes or being shorter or anything even when he stopped and talked to the guys. He wondered if guys only see real obvious stuff like black eyes and broken arm casts and don't notice things like a change in size, weight, or clothes like girls do.

On this thought, he closed his locker and turned towards the first period class. That's when he saw Betty down the hall, and she seemed to be staring at him. From her stance by herself not moving in a corner, she must have been watching for a while. She had a quizzical look about her like she was working out the solution to some hypothesis.

As Henry neared Betty, she darted out and greeted him. "Morning, Henry." and then walked beside him since they did the first class together.

"Uh, hi."

"You're looking quite, ah, happy today."

"Um, thanks."

"That doesn't have anything to do with yesterday, I mean, I, ... uh ... It was nice taking some time together other than school work, and ... uh ... I ... um ..." and she trailed off.

What? Is she coming on to me? Henry thought as he turned and looked straight at her now that they were both the same height.

"Anyway," she started again looking at him curiously with her eyes moving up to the top of his head than back. She now had a very serious look, "I did some more research on bioplastic last evening, and even though the, uh, suit thing, ... well, ... it's a good topic. How about I come over after school, and we discuss it some more?"

She looked at Henry making that face that said she had some very important information that he had probably missed (as he often does trying to breeze through every project). To Betty science and math and physics are serious business that one doesn’t fool around with. Henry was actually surprised that she wanted to do this after the way she put it down the past two days.

Then she added hurriedly, "I know it's Friday and all, and if you have plans ... but we have to turn it in next week." Then she again got a quizzical face looking up and down at him then staring as if there was something she didn't understand.

Henry knew from past experience with his science partner that she obviously wasn't going to take no for an answer. He really wanted to spend the weekend experimenting with the suit and was starting to feel really guilty not telling Betty and even worse for scaring her and causing her to faint.

"No. I mean, OK. Sure. I don't have any plans."

She then smiled the way she does when everything goes right and says, "Great. I have to get something from home first. Then I'll be over." With that they had gotten to the classroom and went to their respective seats.

The rest of the day was normal, almost too normal. Not a comment, crack, or joke was made of Henry's smaller size or mis-fitted clothes. Only Betty's occasional stares during classes seemed out-of-place, but she always smiled when he caught her doing it which made him think maybe she had a crush on him. Of course, by the end of school he had gained about half (ten centimeters) in height back as well as some weight, plus his hair had lightened and shortened.

Henry couldn't believe that people were so unobservant. More so though, Henry was disappointed and a bit sad since he had been so on edge and a bit fearful that someone would notice. His relief from nothing happening actually became a let down, and he sulked through the end of the day and on his way home.

She also pumped Henry for like information. Fortunately, their table was pretty much by itself, but she kept her voice soft to make sure no one overheard. She also always used her Henry-voice and insisted that Henry practice hers as well.

Another surprise to Henry was the salad. He liked it! The dressing was a bit sweet and the cheese added some very nice flavor. It wasn't mushy like the lasagna but crisp and crunched when he chewed which felt good.

About half way through, Betty began to point out different people in the restaurant that she knew, and Henry did the same. It became another game of who could identify who and what the relationship was to either of them. Henry saw his best friend's parents and stated that he rarely talked to them except to say hi or ask if his friend was home. Betty on the other hand, always spoke to her friends' parents and knew a lot about their work and likes and things. She would sometimes point them out again later and ask Henry if he knew anything about them. Henry caught on quickly and had a good memory picking up Betty's knowledge.

"See the waitress with the long, black ponytail. That's Arlene Gibbons, a friend of my mum's. Everyone calls her Arly which she insists on. I've only spoken to her briefly, but if she comes over to you, be nice and make sure you introduce me." Betty pointed out.

"Don't worry. You know how to introduce people." she answered. "Oh, and see the couple just being seated. That's the Lancasters. I baby sit for their daughter, Nikki. She's five and adorable, but not too girlie. You will really like her. And over there, ..."

Henry wanted to ask her what she meant, but Betty kept right on going seeming to time her bites with Henry so his mouth was always full when there was a pause. Besides, he was getting used to hearing his own voice sound so intelligent and sophisticated. He relaxed and thought about the meal, the restaurant and the view.

The sun was now setting sending orange and red beams through the window. Betty and Henry had finished their meals and turned to the window to watch. Henry felt full just from the little salad. Maybe it was just the suit squeezing him down to size, or maybe it was actually really good. The restaurant had turned down its lights, and the small candles on the tables did a flickering dance as the sky grew darker, the clouds backlit by glows of crimson and gold. It was very romantic, or so it would have seemed until Henry realized something. He needed to use the restroom.

Henry reached his Betty-hand across the table and placed it on hers while leaning over towards her not thinking what this may look like. What it did look like was a young woman showing affection for the young man across the table.

"Henry?" Henry whispered in his best Betty-voice now always using each others names because the place was full and they could be easily overheard. Betty turned with a start when she felt his hand but then smiled tenderly at him. She then moved her other hand on top of his so she held it between hers.

"It's very beautiful and romantic, isn't it?" she said.

Henry completely forgot his need, and his eyes became the size of saucers. He then realized the situation and quickly pulled his hand back. After a short pause to get back to his original thought, he whispered, "I have to use the toilet."

"Oh." Betty said as if she had just been told she had gotten a "C" on a test. Then recovered with, "The ladies room is down the hallway over there." nodding to the back of the restaurant. "First door on your left."

"But ..." Henry started.

Betty just put a big smile on her Henry-face and stood up coming round to behind Henry's chair helping pull it out so he could get up. Then she leaned to the side of his head and said softly, "Get used to it or hold it." Obviously, the latter wasn't an option.

Henry anxiously pushed open the door and was relieved to find the room empty. He hurriedly went into a stall and did his business. The suit worked naturally even without having "man parts" exposed. It must somehow reroute things until it reforms them. He shook his head and ddin't want to think about that.

As he was washing up, he heard the main door open and saw a woman come in. Their eyes immediately met, and she said, "Betty. So good to see you. You're looking very lovely this evening."

Although startled, "Thank you, Mrs. Lancaster." just popped out of his mouth as he recognized her. "How have you been?"

"I'm well, thank you, and I'm so glad I ran into you. Can you sit for us Sunday afternoon? Mr. Lancaster and I have just had something come up and no one else is available."

Henry began to get scared. How could he get out of this. He had no idea if Betty was available, but if he turned Mrs. Lancaster down and she was available, it may hurt Betty's spotless record and he didn't want repercussions from Betty if he was the cause of a spot.

"I'm working on a science project this weekend with a friend. We have to turn it in next week, and we're still doing research."

"Is your partner that charming young man you seem to be mesmerized with at the most romantic table in the place? I see you're wearing a little makeup tonight." she asked giving Henry a sly smile.

"Er, yes. I mean no. I mean he's my partner, but we ..."

"It's OK. You can bring him over and do the research while you watch Nikki. She'll probably be taking her nap most of the time. I'd really appreciate it if you did. I'll even throw in a little something extra. Please say yes?"

How could Henry turn her down now. She had no one else to do it, and Betty would get something extra. "Of course, I will do it, Mrs. Lancaster."

"And Betty. I see you are wearing your skirt with the zip on the side again. I know you like it that way, but for that young man out there, you need to shift it around to the back like it should be." With that, she reached over and adjusted Henry's skirt.

"Now you need to freshen up those lips after eating. Need any help with that?"

This made Henry realize that Betty was a real novice at makeup and he wouldn't have to fake it. What luck! he thought. Mrs. Lancaster can help me so I don't end up looking like a clown if I do it.

"Thanks. I'd appreciate your help."

Mrs. Lancaster helped Henry find the lip gloss in his purse and get it on correctly. Then she said, "There. That should do you for whatever comes later." and she winked again finishing with, "Better get back out there. You don't want to loose him." and she went into a stall.

Henry was amazed and actually very happy he had been able to handle that situation as Betty. He was smiling and walking confidently, and looked like a very happy young lady.

He was about half way back to the table when Arly caught him and said, "Hey, Betty. On a hot date? You are going to introduce me aren't you, or do you think I might steal him away? After all, he is good looking."

Henry had never been so quickly trapped nor so embarrassed at having someone say he was good looking besides his mum. There was no way to avoid this, but he immediately snapped back, "I don't think you have a chance, so I'm willing to let you find out who he is." Then he gave her his best Betty-smile and winked. Both of them giggled as they walked to the table.

"Henry, I'd like you to meet Arlene Gibbons. Arlene, this is Henry Folker."

Jumping to her feet, Betty greeted Arlene with a handshake and said, very nice to meet you Ms. Gibbons."

"Please call me Arly, ... anytime." and she winked. Both Henry and she laughed, but Betty acted like she didn't have a clue as Henry would.

As they left the restaurant for the cinema, Betty turned to Henry and said, "I see, Betty, you're finally, really starting to enjoy yourself."

"Yes, Henry, I am." Henry answered. "And, oh by the way, you have a baby sitting date with Nikki Sunday afternoon."

"So, Betty, are you inviting me over to the Lancasters when you watch Nikki? My, are we getting serious?"

Henry thought this all very funny and wasn't taking it seriously until Betty said, "I was wondering how we would fill the rest of the weekend with the suits. Tomorrow, we need to get supplies for more. Betty, your parents have to run the charity auction very early in the morning and will be in bed by the time you get home tonight, so you won't have to be concerned going home to sleep in the suit or seeing them tomorrow. We'll be off to Emily's party Saturday night, hopefully collecting hairs all day long. This will be great to spend as much time using the suits.

"Oh, and, Betty, my mum called," she said holding up Henry'd cell, "to say she and my dad had arrived safely at the convention but may not get back until late Monday, so we have another day as well. I told her I was doing a science project with you, and she said to say hi and that I better treat you like a lady."

Henry was getting more and more bewildered and somewhat worried by Betty's actions and how far her plan may be going even as he became more comfortable pretending to be Betty. How long were we going to test these suits, and Mom actually thought Betty's voice was me. Henry wondered. They walked to the cinema they're hands brushing each other at their sides until they held on as they walked.

Henry was floating with happiness and wasn't paying attention to anything as he closed his locker and turned to rush off home to get ready.

"Hen ..."

Oof. Henry had whirled around again and smacked right into Emily, ... again. Fortunately, they were still both standing this time, but Henry turned tomato red when he saw who it was.

"Sorry. Sorry. I, I, ... I am so ..."

"Oh, Henry. That's OK." Emily smiled very nicely back at him while Henry tried to figure out how to act and say something cool.

"Since we seemed destined to keep meeting like this, maybe it would be safer if you walk me home now for the party so we avoid another crash?" she giggled and continued to smile back at him.

"Ah, sure. OK." came out of Henry's mouth while his brain was still trying to process the fact that Emily, THE Emily, was beside him and asking him to walk her home. Like a puppy obeying, Henry started off down the hall and out the door with Emily beside him.

Emily did think Henry was cute, but more importantly she knew Henry was not a gallivant like a lot of the other guys who were asking her out on dates. Henry was nice and unpolished, but he wasn't stupid. She didn't care if he was an athlete or the most handsome guy. She wanted someone stable and interested in her. She could tell he was infatuated with her and would be easily trained and leashed to provide a good honest boyfriend.

As they walked, she tested him first by just getting him to walk her home. Next by holding out her pack that he readily accepted and carried. Now it was to find out something about him that would determine whether he could really be trusted and if she should continue her pursuit.
